import React from"react";import{Bar}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from"chart.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const ElectricRangeChart=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const electricRangeData=data.map(vehicle=>vehicle["Electric Range"]);const chartData={labels:electricRangeData.map((_,index)=>"Vehicle ".concat(index+1)),datasets:[{label:"Electric Range (miles)",data:electricRangeData,backgroundColor:"#007bff"}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Electric Range Distribution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData})]});};export default ElectricRangeChart;
